etomica.association

Class AssociationManagerMolecule

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.association.AssociationManagerMolecule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoleculeAgentManager.MoleculeAgentSource, IListener

    public class AssociationManagerMolecule
extends java.lang.Object
implements MoleculeAgentManager.MoleculeAgentSource, IListener
    Class to define and track molecule associations. Constructed given an iterator that defines the set of molecules that is managed, and an association definition that is used to determine if molecules are associated. To incorporate an instance of this class in a simulation, add an instance of this EnergySum inner class to the simulation:
    sim.setEnergySum(associationManager.new EnergySum()); If a MC simulation, this should be done before any MCMove classes are instantiated. Also, register this as a listener to IntegratorMC:
    integrator.addMCMoveListener(associationManager);
